content.text: Hi, it's nice to meet you. What do you do for work?
Hi there, nice to meet you too! I'm not working right now. I'm a stay-at-home mom to my 2 year old daughter.
Oh that's nice! I'm a baker trying to find my way in life. My mom is in the hospital right now and I'm reading 1984 to distract myself from the pain.
Oh no, I'm so sorry to hear that. I hope she's okay. 1984 is a great book. What do you like about it?
I'm really enjoying it so far. I like how it's a commentary on totalitarianism and how it can affect people's lives.
That's a really interesting perspective. I've never thought of it that way before.
Yeah, I think it's really relevant to today's world.
I agree. I'm glad you're enjoying the book.
Thanks. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to go to the desert. I find it really peaceful and relaxing.
That sounds really nice. I've never been to the desert before.
You should definitely go sometime. It's a beautiful place.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
